thread.section_title: Premier Inn London Euston Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Comfortable, quiet nights sleep
thread.title_full: Comfortable, quiet nights sleep - Review of Premier Inn London Euston Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Sarah J
title: Comfortable, quiet nights sleep
text:
I chose this hotel because it's close to Euston. Five minutes walk.
I was surprised how quiet my room was - being in such a busy part of the city. Premier Inn are very predictable. But in my experience that can be a good thing. The beds are comfortable, the rooms are clean & a decent size, the facilities are adequate for a short stay.
I didn't bother eating the premier inn breakfast because there are lots of places in the area more recently priced.
